body.p: Please pay to the credit of Mr. George DolbyGeorge Dolby (1831-1900); manager of CD’s readings since 1866: see Pilgrim Letters 8, p. 193n. in account with you. Three Hundred Pounds,The details of CD’s contract with Dolby for the American readings not known; this presumably an interim payment to ensure Dolby’s family had funds to draw on before his return.––––––––––––––––––––––––––CD wrote on a sheet of writing paper turned horizontally; he drew a line across the page after “Pounds,” in imitation of a cheque. £300..0..0.
